enters the bridge of the crashed ship.  He is supprised when every door closes.

"The power was off..."  He thought to himself.
There was a blinking light on the control panel to holoconsole.
Curious but cautious,  hovered off the ground and pushed the button.
The light went dark.  He was startled to see a holographic face appear on the console.

"Emergency defence systems activated...Initiating energon shock in 10...9..."

, in a fit of self-preservation began charging the engery gun on his right arm.  He shot a blow so hard it knocked him backward destroying the door he entered through.  He left the bridge and find that the whole ship was on alert.  He began flying at a high rate; after traveling 250 yards of corridors and blasting through two more doors he got out of the ship.  A shield was raised throwing him into the nearby hillside.

"Curses!"
